name: Creating Own Github Page
body:
# Test repository to learn creating github page.

## Following are the steps to do so:

* Creat an empty repository.
* Go to settings for the same repo.
* Go to page layout (at bottom of page).
* Choose any layout.
* Publish the page.
* On next page you will see a url at the top that url is for your repository specific page url.

```java
public class HelloWorld {
   public static void main(String[] args) {
     System.out.println("Hello World !!! Making my own GitHub page.");
   }
}

```

## Languages I want to learn
|Languages|
|---------|
|Python|
|Scala|

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
